TopicTitle: Would like to know how to disable text (Contract Configurator?)

Articles.Content: I believe it is ContractConfigurator but during flights (usually when i have a running contract), Green info text show AP, PE, Orbital Period and biome will appear in the middle of the screen...If anyone knows how to disable this that would be great
are you sure its contract configurator? try unninstalling all mods exept contract configurator

On 3/23/2018 at 7:39 AM, Jdedo said:

I believe it is ContractConfigurator but during flights (usually when i have a running contract), Green info text show AP, PE, Orbital Period and biome will appear in the middle of the screen...If anyone knows how to disable this that would be great

 

Can you give us a mod list or a screenshot of your gamedata? Or a screenshot of the issue?
